title: After Draft Pick, Sam Poised To Become NFL's First Openly Gay Player
teaser: Former University of Missouri defensive end Michael Sam was selected by the St. Louis Rams, making Sam the first openly gay player to be drafted in the NFL. Cyd Zeigler, the co-founder of OutSports, explains more.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
